**Total Estimated Costs:**
- Accommodations: $1034 (Atlanta) + $587 (Decatur) + $637 (Augusta) = $2258
- Meals: $39 + $22 + $27 + $59 + $19 + $27 + $75 + $47 + $69 + $42 + $66 + $44 + $13 + $74 + $37 + $86 + $87 = $853
- Transportation: $9 (Chattanooga to Atlanta) + $0 (Atlanta to Decatur) + $11 (Decatur to Augusta) + $21 (Augusta to Chattanooga) = $41
- Total: $2258 (Accommodations) + $853 (Meals) + $41 (Transportation) = $3152
